FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY a.acc_id ORDER BY a.room_price, IFNULL(a.empty_room_stock, a.room_stock) desc) 'order' FROM( SELECT a.acc_id 'acc_id', a.user_id, a.acc_name, a.accType_no, a.province_no, a.acc_city, a.acc_zip, a.acc_addr,a.acc_addrDetail, a.acc_longtitude, a.acc_lattitude, a.acc_xy, a.acc_mainInfo, a.acc_info, a.acc_comment, a.acc_thumbs, a.acc_rate, a.acc_review, a.acc_season, r.room_maxNum 'room_maxNum', r.room_id, r.room_price 'room_price', r.room_stock 'room_stock', r.room_thumb, r.room_name,r.room_addPrice,r.room_info,r.room_checkIn, r.room_checkOut, IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock) as 'empty_room_stock', ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY a.acc_id ORDER BY r.room_price, IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock) desc) 'top', SUM(IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock)) OVER(PARTITION BY a.acc_id) 'sum_room_stock' FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` a JOIN `lemo_product_room` r ON a.acc_id = r.acc_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.acc_id 'acc_id', r.room_id 'room_id', (r.room_stock - COUNT(rero.rero_id)) 'empty_room_stock' FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` a JOIN `lemo_product_room` r ON a.acc_id = r.acc_id JOIN `lemo_product_reserved_room` rero ON r.room_id = rero.room_id AND r.acc_id = rero.acc_id
WHERE
AND (rero.rero_checkOut_date > DATE(NOW()) AND rero.rero_checkIn_date < DATE_ADD(DATE(NOW()), INTERVAL 1 DAY))
AND (rero.rero_checkOut_date > #{checkIn} AND rero.rero_checkIn_date < #{checkOut})
GROUP BY a.`acc_id`, r.room_id ) b ON a.acc_id = b.acc_id AND r.room_id = b.room_id
WHERE
ORDER BY a.acc_id) a WHERE (a.empty_room_stock != 0 OR (a.sum_room_stock = 0 AND a.top = 1))
AND a.room_maxNum > #{headcount}
) a
JOIN `lemo_product_accommodationtype` t ON a.accType_no = t.accType_no LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_ratepolicy` c ON a.acc_id = c.acc_id
WHERE a.order = 1
AND a.`accType_no` In(${accTypes})
AND (a.`room_price` BETWEEN #{minPrice} AND #{maxPrice})
